channel.title: 718 Client Connection Error [HELP]
channel.description:
The error: [url=http://gyazo.com/a996d5d4a1308fb15e2000f05caa410f]a996d5d4a1308fb15e2000f05caa410f.png[/url]
Yes i portforwarded (removed my IP): [url=http://gyazo.com/7dd5c83cf1948bb3ef8ea7da14f87bb4]7dd5c83cf1948bb3ef8ea7da14f87bb4.png[/url]
SUB_REVISION = 1 on client and 127.0.0.1 localhost: [url=http://gyazo.com/211941a4d9f88be494d023f7f80a02e7]211941a4d9f88be494d023f7f80a02e7.png[/url]
CUSTOM_CLIENT_BUILD = 1 (same as client): [url=http://gyazo.com/ab3ff2cd8f194d6ec32cb549ee5e06ad]ab3ff2cd8f194d6ec32cb549ee5e06ad.png[/url]
Yes, i compiled both.
I'm using the Desolution 718 source: [url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/downloads/520970-desolution-718-742-enjoy-little-things-release.html]http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/downloads/520970-desolution-718-742-enjoy-little-things-release.html[/url]
I'm using this client: [url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/downloads/448758-718-client-run-compiler-no-errors.html]http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/downloads/448758-718-client-run-compiler-no-errors.html[/url]
What went wrong?

item.title: 718 Client Connection Error [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @Impactz Impactz
item.description:
@Impactz wrote:

The error:
a996d5d4a1308fb15e2000f05caa410f.png

Yes i portforwarded (removed my IP):
7dd5c83cf1948bb3ef8ea7da14f87bb4.png

SUB_REVISION = 1 on client and 127.0.0.1 localhost:
211941a4d9f88be494d023f7f80a02e7.png

ab3ff2cd8f194d6ec32cb549ee5e06ad.png

Yes, i compiled both.

I’m using the Desolution 718 source:
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/downloads/520970-desolution-718-742-enjoy-little-things-release.html
